actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: Commending hospice care providers such as Hospeace House for allowing people with life-limiting illness or injury to die pain-free and with dignity.

summary.text: Recognizes Hospeace House and the rest of the nation's hospice providers for caring for people who have months rather than years to live. Encourages hospice providers to establish community partnerships.

titles.title: Commending hospice care providers such as Hospeace House for allowing people with life-limiting illness or injury to die pain-free and with dignity.
